titleStmt.title: A proclamation for the preuenting and remedying of the dearth of graine, and other victuals.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie.,

notesStmt.note: Citing procedures to prevent export of grain, etc. Cf. STC.
Dated at end: Oatlands the second day of Iune, in the sixt yeere of our reigne ...
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
